mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CHALLENGES WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND CHALLENGE_MODE = #{challengeMode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MYCHALL ( CHALLENGE_ID, USER_ID, STATUS, START_DATE, END_DATE ) VALUES ( #{challengeId}, #{userId}, #{status}, #{startDate}, #{endDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT CHALLENGE_ID AS challengeId, DESCRIPTION AS description, TARGET AS target, DURATION AS duration, CATEGORY AS category, TYPE AS type, STATUS AS status, TARGET_COUNT AS targetCount, CHALLENGE_MODE AS challengeMode FROM CHALLENGES WHERE CHALLENGE_ID = #{challengeId}

SELECT NVL(SUM(ORIGINAL_AMOUNT), 0) AS "sum", COUNT(*) AS "cnt" FROM MYTRANS WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND TYPE = 'IN' AND TRUNC(TRANS_DATE) >= TO_DATE(#{fromDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TRUNC(TRANS_DATE) <= TO_DATE(#{toDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT NVL(SUM(ORIGINAL_AMOUNT), 0) AS "sum", COUNT(*) AS "cnt" FROM MYTRANS WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND TYPE = 'OUT' AND TRUNC(TRANS_DATE) >= TO_DATE(#{fromDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TRUNC(TRANS_DATE) <= TO_DATE(#{toDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.update: UPDATE MYCHALL SET STATUS = 'PROCEEDING' WHERE STATUS = 'RESERVED' AND TRUNC(START_DATE) <= TRUNC(SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT mc.CHALLENGE_ID AS challengeId, mc.USER_ID AS userId, mc.STATUS AS status, mc.START_DATE AS startDate, mc.END_DATE AS endDate, ch.DESCRIPTION AS description, ch.TARGET AS target, ch.TARGET_COUNT AS targetCount, ch.DURATION AS duration, ch.CATEGORY AS category, ch.TYPE AS type, ch.CHALLENGE_MODE AS challengeMode FROM MYCHALL mc JOIN CHALLENGES ch ON mc.CHALLENGE_ID = ch.CHALLENGE_ID WHERE mc.STATUS = 'PROCEEDING' AND TRUNC(mc.END_DATE) < TRUNC(SYSDATE)

SELECT mc.CHALLENGE_ID AS challengeId, mc.USER_ID AS userId, mc.STATUS AS status, mc.START_DATE AS startDate, mc.END_DATE AS endDate, ch.DESCRIPTION AS description, ch.TARGET AS target, ch.TARGET_COUNT AS targetCount, ch.DURATION AS duration, ch.CATEGORY AS category, ch.TYPE AS type, ch.CHALLENGE_MODE AS challengeMode FROM MYCHALL mc JOIN CHALLENGES ch ON mc.CHALLENGE_ID = ch.CHALLENGE_ID WHERE mc.STATUS = 'PROCEEDING' AND TRUNC(mc.END_DATE) >= TRUNC(SYSDATE)

SELECT NVL(SUM(ORIGINAL_AMOUNT), 0) AS sum FROM MYTRANS WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND TYPE = 'OUT' AND TRUNC(TRANS_DATE) >= TO_DATE(#{fromDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TRUNC(TRANS_DATE) <= TO_DATE(#{toDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND CATEGORY = #{category}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM MYTRANS WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND TYPE = 'OUT' AND TRUNC(TRANS_DATE) >= TO_DATE(#{fromDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TRUNC(TRANS_DATE) <= TO_DATE(#{toDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND CATEGORY = #{category}

choose.when: INSERT INTO GROUPCHALL ( CHALLENGE_ID, GROUPB_ID, START_DATE, END_DATE, STATUS ) SELECT #{challengeId}, #{groupbId}, SYSDATE, MAX(END_DATE), 'PROCEEDING' FROM GROUPBUDGET WHERE GROUPB_ID = #{groupbId}
choose.otherwise: INSERT INTO GROUPCHALL ( CHALLENGE_ID, GROUPB_ID, START_DATE, END_DATE, STATUS ) VALUES ( #{challengeId}, #{groupbId}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, 'PROCEEDING' )

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GROUPCHALL_RESULT (GROUPB_ID, CHALLENGE_ID, START_DATE, END_DATE, USER_ID, STATUS) SELECT #{groupbId}, #{challengeId}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, M.USER_ID, 'PROCEEDING' FROM BUDGETMEM M WHERE M.GROUPB_ID = #{groupbId} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM GROUPCHALL_RESULT R WHERE R.GROUPB_ID = #{groupbId} AND R.CHALLENGE_ID = #{challengeId} AND TRUNC(R.START_DATE) = TRUNC(#{startDate}) AND R.USER_ID = M.USER_ID )
mapper.update: UPDATE GROUPCHALL_RESULT SET STATUS = 'FAILED', UPDATED_AT = SYSDATE WHERE GROUPB_ID = #{groupbId} AND CHALLENGE_ID = 'group_zero_challenge' AND STATUS = 'PROCEEDING' AND USER_ID = #{userId} AND #{transDate} BETWEEN TRUNC(START_DATE) AND (TRUNC(END_DATE) + 0.99999)
UPDATE GROUPCHALL_RESULT SET STATUS = 'CLOSED', UPDATED_AT = SYSDATE WHERE CHALLENGE_ID = 'group_zero_challenge' AND STATUS = 'PROCEEDING' AND TRUNC(END_DATE) < TRUNC(SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT GROUPB_ID AS groupbId, CHALLENGE_ID AS challengeId, TRUNC(START_DATE) AS startDate, TRUNC(END_DATE) AS endDate FROM GROUPCHALL WHERE STATUS = 'PROCEEDING' AND TRUNC(END_DATE) < TRUNC(SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE GROUPCHALL_RESULT R SET TOTAL_AMOUNT = ( SELECT NVL(SUM(GT.ORIGINAL_AMOUNT), 0) FROM GROUPTRANS GT WHERE GT.GROUPB_ID = R.GROUPB_ID AND GT.USER_ID = R.USER_ID AND GT.TYPE = 'OUT' AND GT.TRANS_DATE >= TRUNC(R.START_DATE) AND GT.TRANS_DATE < TRUNC(R.END_DATE) + 1 ), UPDATED_AT = SYSDATE WHERE R.GROUPB_ID = :1 AND R.CHALLENGE_ID = 'group_reduceZero_competition' AND TRUNC(R.START_DATE) = TRUNC(:2)

MERGE INTO GROUPCHALL_RESULT R USING ( SELECT R2.GROUPB_ID, R2.CHALLENGE_ID, R2.START_DATE, R2.USER_ID, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY R2.TOTAL_AMOUNT ASC, R2.USER_ID ASC) AS RNK FROM GROUPCHALL_RESULT R2 WHERE R2.GROUPB_ID = #{groupbId} AND R2.CHALLENGE_ID = 'group_reduceZero_competition' AND TRUNC(R2.START_DATE) = TRUNC(#{startDate}) ) S ON ( R.GROUPB_ID = S.GROUPB_ID AND R.CHALLENGE_ID = S.CHALLENGE_ID AND TRUNC(R.START_DATE) = TRUNC(S.START_DATE) AND R.USER_ID = S.USER_ID ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET R.RNK = S.RNK, R.UPDATED_AT = SYSDATE

UPDATE GROUPCHALL_RESULT SET STATUS = CASE WHEN RNK = 1 THEN 'SUCCESS' ELSE 'FAILED' END, UPDATED_AT = SYSDATE WHERE GROUPB_ID = #{groupbId} AND CHALLENGE_ID = 'group_reduceZero_competition' AND TRUNC(START_DATE) = TRUNC(#{startDate}) AND STATUS = 'PROCEEDING'
mapper.select: SELECT R.USER_ID AS USER_ID, B.BADGE_ID AS BADGE_ID FROM GROUPCHALL_RESULT R JOIN BADGE B ON B.CHALLENGE_ID = R.CHALLENGE_ID WHERE R.STATUS = 'SUCCESS' AND TRUNC(R.END_DATE) <= TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM USERBADGE UB WHERE UB.USER_ID = R.USER_ID AND UB.BADGE_ID = B.BADGE_ID )
mapper.update: UPDATE GROUPCHALL SET STATUS = 'SUCCESS' WHERE STATUS = 'PROCEEDING' AND TRUNC(END_DATE) < TRUNC(SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT CHALLENGE_ID as challengeId, GROUPB_ID as groupbId, STATUS as status, START_DATE as startDate, END_DATE as endDate FROM GROUPCHALL WHERE GROUPB_ID = #{groupbId}
mapper.update: UPDATE GROUPCHALL SET STATUS = 'FAILED' WHERE GROUPB_ID = #{groupbId} AND CHALLENGE_ID = 'group_zero_challenge' AND STATUS = 'PROCEEDING'
mapper.select: SELECT GT.USER_ID AS "userId", GT.NICKNAME AS "nickname", SUM(GT.ORIGINAL_AMOUNT) AS "totalAmount", RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(GT.ORIGINAL_AMOUNT) ASC) AS "rank" FROM GROUPTRANS GT JOIN GROUPCHALL GC ON GC.GROUPB_ID = GT.GROUPB_ID AND GC.CHALLENGE_ID = #{challengeId} AND GC.STATUS = 'PROCEEDING' WHERE GT.GROUPB_ID = #{groupbId} AND GT.TYPE = 'OUT' AND GT.TRANS_DATE BETWEEN TRUNC(GC.START_DATE) AND (TRUNC(GC.END_DATE) + 0.99999) GROUP BY GT.USER_ID, GT.NICKNAME ORDER BY "rank" ASC

SELECT gc.CHALLENGE_ID as challengeId, gc.GROUPB_ID as groupbId, gc.STATUS as status, gc.START_DATE as startDate, gc.END_DATE as endDate, c.DESCRIPTION as description, c.CATEGORY as category, c.TYPE as type, c.DURATION as duration, c.TARGET as target, c.TARGET_COUNT as targetCount FROM GROUPCHALL gc JOIN CHALLENGES c ON gc.CHALLENGE_ID = c.CHALLENGE_ID WHERE gc.GROUPB_ID = #{groupbId} AND gc.STATUS IN ('SUCCESS', 'FAILED') ORDER BY gc.END_DATE DESC
